about_the_game:
... Another day has passed. Did you live your life to the fullest?

Potato Survival is a short story game about a character who lives alone on the open sea, collecting potatoes to survive for 21 days. With the knowledge you can gain every day, unlock new skills to create a more meaningful daily life! Experiencing relationships in the midst of this everyday life is the objective of the game.

This game was inspired by the theme of "isolation" presented by the regularly hosted '1Chicken Rpg Maker Game Jam 2022' in Korea.

We hope you enjoy the game!
